fields.summary: euform-validate-template chokes on responses with capability info

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

euform-create-stack doesn't support '--capabilities' option, which is needed for the creation of nested Cloudformation stacks.
{code}
# euform-create-stack --help
usage: euform-create-stack (--template-file FILE | --template-url URL) [-d]
                           [-n ARN[,...]] [-p KEY=VALUE] [-t MINUTES]
                           [--tag KEY[=VALUE]] [--show-empty-fields] [-U URL]
                           [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY]
                           [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug] [--debugger]
                           [--version] [-h]
                           STACK

Create a new stack

positional arguments:
  STACK                 name of the new stack (required)

optional arguments:
  --template-file FILE  file containing the new stack's JSON template
  --template-url URL    URL pointing to the new stack's JSON template
  -d, --disable-rollback
                        disable rollback on failure
  -n ARN[,...], --notification-arns ARN[,...]
                        SNS ARNs to publish stack actions to
  -p KEY=VALUE, --parameter KEY=VALUE
                        key and value of the parameters to use with the new
                        stack's template, separated by an "=" character
  -t MINUTES, --timeout MINUTES
                        timeout for stack creation
  --tag KEY[=VALUE]     key and optional value of the tag to create, separated
                        by an "=" character. If no value is given the tag's
                        value is set to an empty string.
  --show-empty-fields   show empty values as "(nil)"
  -U URL, --url URL     deployment templating service endpoint URL
  --region USER@REGION  region and/or user names to search when looking up
                        config file data
  -I KEY_ID, --access-key-id KEY_ID
  -S KEY, --secret-key KEY
  --security-token TOKEN
  --debug               show debugging output
  --debugger            launch interactive debugger on error
  --version             show the program's version and exit
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-24-gacb04e8 (Apollo)
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

Information regarding _--capabilities_ option
{code}
--capabilities (list)

A list of capabilities that you must specify before AWS CloudFormation can create or update certain stacks. Some stack templates might include resources that can affect permissions in your AWS account. For those stacks, you must explicitly acknowledge their capabilities by specifying this parameter.
Currently, the only valid value is CAPABILITY_IAM , which is required for the following resources: AWS::CloudFormation::Stack , AWS::IAM::AccessKey , AWS::IAM::Group , AWS::IAM::InstanceProfile , AWS::IAM::Policy , AWS::IAM::Role , AWS::IAM::User , and AWS::IAM::UserToGroupAddition . If your stack template contains these resources, we recommend that you review any permissions associated with them. If you don't specify this parameter, this action returns an InsufficientCapabilities error.
Syntax:

"string" "string" ...

Where valid values are:
  CAPABILITY_IAM
{code}
fields.summary: euform-create-stack doesn't support '--capabilities' option to create nested Cloudformation stack

comments.body: [~gholms]: K, I see the option now with euform-create-stack: {code} # euca-version euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-55-g61d2930 (Apollo) # euform-create-stack --help usage: euform-create-stack (--template-file FILE | --template-url URL) [-d] [-n ARN[,...]] [--capabilities CAP[,...]] [-p KEY=VALUE] [-t MINUTES] [--tag KEY[=VALUE]] [--show-empty-fields] [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h] STACK Create a new stack positional arguments: STACK name of the new stack (required) optional arguments: --template-file FILE file containing the new stack's JSON template --template-url URL URL pointing to the new stack's JSON template -d, --disable-rollback disable rollback on failure -n ARN[,...], --notification-arns ARN[,...] SNS ARNs to publish stack actions to --capabilities CAP[,...] capabilities needed to create the stack -p KEY=VALUE, --parameter KEY=VALUE key and value of the parameters to use with the new stack's template, separated by an "=" character -t MINUTES, --timeout MINUTES timeout for stack creation --tag KEY[=VALUE] key and optional value of the tag to create, separated by an "=" character. If no value is given the tag's value is set to an empty string. --show-empty-fields show empty values as "(nil)" -U URL, --url URL deployment templating service endpoint URL --region USER@REGION region and/or user names to search when looking up config file data -I KEY_ID, --access-key-id KEY_ID -S KEY, --secret-key KEY --security-token TOKEN --debug show debugging output --debugger launch interactive debugger on error --version show the program's version and exit -h, --help show this help message and exit {code} However, when I try to deploy a nested stack, I get the following error: {code} # euform-create-stack NestedStack --template-file cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region admin-hspencer@group1 euform-create-stack: error (InsufficientCapabilities): Required capabilities:[CAPABILITY_IAM] {code} Looks like something is up with what its being sent to the Cloudformation service: {code} # euform-create-stack NestedStack --template-file cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region admin-hspencer@group1 --debug 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 DEBUG CreateStack parsed arguments: {'Capabilities.member.': ['CAPABILITY_IAM'], 'NotificationARNs.member': None, 'security_token': None, 'TemplateBody': , 'url': None, 'Tags.member': None, 'TimeoutInMinutes': None, 'StackName': 'NestedStack', 'param_sets': None, 'secret_key': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'DisableRollback': False, 'key_id': None, 'TemplateURL': None, 'region': 'admin-hspencer@group1'} 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 INFO Config finding region option cloudformation-url 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 DEBUG Config section group1 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 INFO Config found group1::cloudformation-url = 'http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/' 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 INFO Config finding region option name 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 DEBUG Config section group1 2015-01-08 22:02:48,363 INFO Config found group1::name = 'group1' 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config finding region option verify-ssl 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 DEBUG Config section group1 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 DEBUG Config section * 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config novalue for verify-ssl 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config finding user option key-id 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 DEBUG Config section admin-hspencer 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config found admin-hspencer::key-id = 'AKINQBK9GW1PLKHCHZM9' 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config finding user option secret-key 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 DEBUG Config section admin-hspencer 2015-01-08 22:02:48,364 INFO Config found admin-hspencer::secret-key = 2015-01-08 22:02:48,367 INFO CreateStack parameters: {'StackName': 'NestedStack', 'Capabilities.member..1': 'CAPABILITY_IAM', 'Version': '2010-05-15', 'TemplateBody': '{\n "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09",\n "Description" : "Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL",\n "Resources" : {\n "BucketStack" : {\n\t "Type" : "AWS::CloudFormation::Stack",\n\t "Properties" : {\n\t "TemplateURL" : "https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10129/cfn-bucket-template.json",\n "TimeoutInMinutes" : "60"\n\t }\n }\n },\n "Outputs": {\n "StackRef": {"Value": { "Ref" : "BucketStack"}},\n "OutputFromNestedStack" : {\n "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "BucketStack", "Outputs.BucketName" ] }\n }\n }\n}\n', 'DisableRollback': 'false', 'Action': 'CreateStack'} 2015-01-08 22:02:48,367 INFO CloudFormation sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-01-08 22:02:48,368 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\ncloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773\n/\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKINQBK9GW1PLKHCHZM9&Action=CreateStack&Capabilities.member..1=CAPABILITY_IAM&DisableRollback=false&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&StackName=NestedStack&TemplateBody=%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%22AWSTemplateFormatVersion%22%20%3A%20%222010-09-09%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22Description%22%20%3A%20%22Cloudformation%20Example%20%3D%3E%20Nested%20Stack%20that%20pulls%20CF%20template%20from%20S3%20URL%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22Resources%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22BucketStack%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22Type%22%20%3A%20%22AWS%3A%3ACloudFormation%3A%3AStack%22%2C%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22Properties%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22TemplateURL%22%20%3A%20%22https%3A%2F%2Fs3.amazonaws.com%2Feuca10129%2Fcfn-bucket-template.json%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22TimeoutInMinutes%22%20%3A%20%2260%22%0A%09%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%7D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22Outputs%22%3A%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22StackRef%22%3A%20%7B%22Value%22%3A%20%7B%20%22Ref%22%20%3A%20%22BucketStack%22%7D%7D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22OutputFromNestedStack%22%20%3A%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%22Value%22%20%3A%20%7B%20%22Fn%3A%3AGetAtt%22%20%3A%20%5B%20%22BucketStack%22%2C%20%22Outputs.BucketName%22%20%5D%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%7D%0A&Timestamp=2015-01-08T22%3A02%3A48Z&Version=2010-05-15' 2015-01-08 22:02:48,368 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: ZNdNJoLiGt+PwHyjo3m4I4hvLbKeqJ+7vRSaoCmyfWs= 2015-01-08 22:02:48,368 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request method: POST 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request url: http://cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request header: Content-Length: 1187 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request header: Host: cloudformation.h-12.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.2.0-pre1-55-g61d2930 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.1.3.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.3 requests/2.5.1 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: AWSAccessKeyId: AKINQBK9GW1PLKHCHZM9 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: Action: CreateStack 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: Capabilities.member..1: CAPABILITY_IAM 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: DisableRollback: false 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: Signature: ZNdNJoLiGt+PwHyjo3m4I4hvLbKeqJ+7vRSaoCmyfWs= 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256 2015-01-08 22:02:48,374 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: SignatureVersion: 2 2015-01-08 22:02:48,375 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: StackName: NestedStack 2015-01-08 22:02:48,375 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: TemplateBody: { "AWSTemplateFormatVersion" : "2010-09-09", "Description" : "Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL", "Resources" : { "BucketStack" : { "Type" : "AWS::CloudFormation::Stack", "Properties" : { "TemplateURL" : "https://s3.amazonaws.com/euca10129/cfn-bucket-template.json", "TimeoutInMinutes" : "60" } } }, "Outputs": { "StackRef": {"Value": { "Ref" : "BucketStack"}}, "OutputFromNestedStack" : { "Value" : { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "BucketStack", "Outputs.BucketName" ] } } } } 2015-01-08 22:02:48,375 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: Timestamp: 2015-01-08T22:02:48Z 2015-01-08 22:02:48,375 DEBUG CloudFormation request data: Version: 2010-05-15 2015-01-08 22:02:48,469 DEBUG CloudFormation response time: 0.094 seconds 2015-01-08 22:02:48,470 ERROR CloudFormation response status: 400 2015-01-08 22:02:48,470 DEBUG CloudFormation response header: content-length: 287 2015-01-08 22:02:48,470 DEBUG CloudFormation response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2015-01-08 22:02:48,471 DEBUG CreateStack -- response content -- SenderInsufficientCapabilitiesRequired capabilities:[CAPABILITY_IAM]d19d1601-780a-4654-b4d2-80caabc1dc55 2015-01-08 22:02:48,471 DEBUG CreateStack -- end of response content -- 2015-01-08 22:02:48,471 INFO CreateStack result: failure euform-create-stack: error (InsufficientCapabilities): Required capabilities:[CAPABILITY_IAM] Traceback (most recent call last): File "/root/euca2ools-dev/bin/euform-create-stack", line 5, in pkg_resources.run_script('euca2ools==3.2.0-pre1-55-g61d2930', 'euform-create-stack') File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 540, in run_script self.require(requires)[0].run_script(script_name, ns) File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 1455, in run_script execfile(script_filename, namespace, namespace) File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_pre1_55_g61d2930-py2.6.egg/EGG-INFO/scripts/euform-create-stack", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.cloudformation.createstack.CreateStack.run() File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.2.3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.2.3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run result = cmd.main() File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.2.3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/request.py", line 218, in main response = self.send() File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.2.3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/request.py", line 180, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.2.3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/request.py", line 167, in send auth=self.auth) File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder-0.2.3-py2.6.egg/requestbuilder/service.py", line 198, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/root/euca2ools-dev/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_pre1_55_g61d2930-py2.6.egg/euca2ools/commands/cloudformation/__init__.py", line 52, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (400, 'InsufficientCapabilities', 'InsufficientCapabilities', 'Required capabilities:[CAPABILITY_IAM]') {code} I checked in cloud-requests log and saw the following: {code} Thu Jan 8 14:02:48 2015 d19d1601-780a-4654-b4d2-80caabc1dc55 arn:aws:euare::891654978359:user/admin /10.104.7.23:58642 /10.111.5.12:8773 cloudformation CreateStackType [POST,TemplateBody=********,StackName=Neste dStack,Capabilities.member..1=CAPABILITY_IAM,DisableRollback=false] Thu Jan 8 14:02:48 2015 d19d1601-780a-4654-b4d2-80caabc1dc55 arn:aws:euare::891654978359:user/admin /10.104.7.23:58642 /10.111.5.12:8773 cloudformation CloudFormationErrorResponse [400 InsufficientCapabilities] {code} Here is what I saw in cloud-exhaust.log: {code} Thu Jan 8 13:58:07 2015 ERROR [org.mule.exception.DefaultMessagingExceptionStrategy:CloudFormation.02] ******************************************************************************** Message : Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{CloudFormation.component}. Message payload is of type: CreateStackType Code : MULE_ERROR--2 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Exception stack is: 1. Required capabilities:[CAPABILITY_IAM] (com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.InsufficientCapabilitiesException) com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.template.TemplateParser:165 (null) 2. Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{CloudFormation.component}. Message payload is of type: CreateStackType (org.mule.component.ComponentException) org.mule.component.DefaultComponentLifecycleAdapter:352 (http://www.mulesoft.org/docs/site/current3/apidocs/org/mule/component/ComponentException.html) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Root Exception stack trace: com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.InsufficientCapabilitiesException: Required capabilities:[CAPABILITY_IAM] at com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.template.TemplateParser.parse(TemplateParser.java:165) at com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.CloudFormationService.createStack(CloudFormationService.java:195) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) + 3 more (set debug level logging or '-Dmule.verbose.exceptions=true' for everything) ******************************************************************************** {code} Now, when I compared the request against what AWS CLI provides (which works), I see the following in the cloud-requests.log: {code} hu Jan 8 14:13:15 2015 62a610c4-1dee-4a57-8bdd-1ace23293369 arn:aws:euare::891654978359:user/admin /10.5.1.42:57682 /10.111.5.12:8773 cloudformation CreateStackType [POST,StackName=NestedBucketStack,Capabilities.member.1=CAPABILITY_IAM,TemplateBody=********] {code} From the looks of it, euform-create-stack isn't sending the "Capabilities.member" correctly. Looking at the code in ./euca2ools/euca2ools/commands/cloudformation/createstack.py: {code} Arg('--capabilities', dest='Capabilities.member.', metavar='CAP[,...]', type=delimited_list(','), {code} Looks like 'Capabilities.member' has an un-needed '.' at the end. I did a quick test, and removed it. {code} # euform-create-stack NestedStack --template-file cfn-nested-euca10018-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region admin-hspencer@group1 arn:aws:cloudformation::891654978359:stack/NestedStack/6326b603-6cd0-4585-afb5-08df436920d0 # euform-describe-stacks NestedStack --region admin-hspencer@group1 STACK NestedStack CREATE_IN_PROGRESS User Initiated Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL 2015-01-08T22:19:44.034Z {code} {code} # euform-describe-stacks NestedStack --region admin-hspencer@group1 STACK NestedStack CREATE_COMPLETE Complete! Cloudformation Example => Nested Stack that pulls CF template from S3 URL 2015-01-08T22:19:44.034Z OUTPUT StackRef arn:aws:cloudformation::891654978359:stack/NestedStack-BucketStack-ZYF2KUD2Q0AMM/512a96d1-9101-4197-8548-372becd2cff0 OUTPUT OutputFromNestedStack nestedstack-bucketstack-zyf2kud2q0amm-s3bucket-sdm01z3dvp4k3 {code} Pull request is here - https://github.com/eucalyptus/euca2ools/pull/58. Once this has been merged, this issue can be marked as verified. Let me know if there are any questions.
